summary: Kee Lee Wolf-Runner: A Nordic Barbarian warrior that is willing to follow you, but she is not nice about it.  She is a stunning Blonde with an attitude and lets you know who is boss.  Handy with a two handed weapon as well as bow and arrow, she will stand her ground and help you in the hardest moments.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://radogamers.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/KeeLeeTitleimage-e1419197478206.jpg[/img]
[font=Verdana][size=3]

Kee Lee Wolf-Runner: A Nordic Barbarian warrior that is willing to follow you, but she's not nice about it.  She's a stunning Blonde with an attitude and let's you know who's boss.  Handy with a two handed weapon as well as bow and arrow, she will stand her ground and help you in the hardest moments.

Said to be a descendant of Skjoldr Wolf-Runner mentioned in the tales of the Thirsk Mead Hall, it has been told he slew the wizard Griss the Yellow and presented his head as a battle trophy. He then ruled over Thirsk for three years until he was slain in the mead hall massacre.

Kee Lee works well with EFF but no clue about UFO as I don't use it. You can find her at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun, ready to do battle and adventure along by your side, equipped with Barbarian Hunter skins and a Steel Broad Sword. Don't underestimate her by her looks she isn't very friendly.

Of all the followers I've created I have grown to like her quickly, who says a follower has to be a nice person, a little friction makes for interesting times. If you can stand her attitude she is Marriageable. She's a Combat Warrior and starts at level 5 and will go to 60, if you want her to go higher you can change it in the CK, if you need help with it let me know.[/size][/font]

************************************************************************************************
[size=4][b][font=Tahoma]Required:[/font][/b][/size]

[font=Verdana][size=3]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?[/size][/font]


[size=4][b][font=Tahoma]Essential Mods For Her Looks:[/font][/b][/size]

[font=Verdana][size=3]1.Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE by Caliente

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
I still use V3-2 I recommend the new version.

2. CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by Navetsea

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/?
Many options and excellent choices for further enhancement of female mods.

3. Natural Eyes by Nevenbridge

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?[/size][/font]


******************************************************************************************************
[b][font=Tahoma][size=3]
[size=4]Recommended Mods: These are Recommended not Required.[/size][/size][/font][/b]

[font=Verdana][size=3]1. Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2-V3 Armor Replacer -Work In Progress by KillerKeo

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654/?

2. Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO by Terzaerian

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?

FCO unlocks hidden NPC dialog and enhances the speech patterns,
it gives Kee Lee more rude comments to say.

(requires SkyUI:  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/? and SKSE "Skyrim Script Extender".  http://skse.silverlock.org/ )
[/size][/font]
[b][font=Tahoma][size=4]Installation:[/size][/font][/b]

[font=Verdana][size=3]Use NMM (highly recommended) or for manual install copy all files in Skyrim data folder.[/size][/font]
author: Radogamer
